doc.author: Jose Angel Munoz (@imjoseangel)
description: Retrieve information on docker stacks using the C(docker stack) command on the target node (see examples).
doc.short_description: Return information on a docker stack

community.docker.docker_stack_info.examples:
- name: Shows stack info
    community.docker.docker_stack_info:
    register: result

  - name: Show results
    ansible.builtin.debug:
      var: result.results

results.description:
List of dictionaries containing the list of stacks or tasks associated
to a stack name.
